alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 16 at 2:48AM EST until January 16 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter of a mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Glades, Hendry, Inland Palm Beach County, Coastal Collier County, Inland Collier County and Inland Broward County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Observations as well as satellite imagery and traffic cameras show that areas of fog have developed across the Lake Okeechobee region as well as interior portions of South Florida. As this fog gradually expands overnight, visibility could drop to one quarter of a mile or less in these areas. Visibility should begin to improve after sunrise as the fog begins to lift.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
